seo.title: Contact
seo.description: Contact RENAISSANCE Paris for any questions about our luxury eyewear. Customer service available by email and phone Monday to Friday.

hero.label: The House
hero.subtitle: At your service.
hero.description: Our team is available to answer all your questions about our collections, your orders or our partner opticians network.
hero.descriptionMobile: Our team is available to answer all your questions.

formSection.label: Message
formSection.title: Write to us.
formSection.subtitle: We will get back to you shortly.

sidebar.locationDescription: Maison Renaissance is proudly established in Paris, capital of elegance and French craftsmanship.
sidebar.networkDescription: Visit one of our 200+ partner opticians to try our collections and receive personalized advice.
sidebar.socialDescription: Discover our new collections and news from the House.

seo.title: Find a Partner Optician
seo.description: Find one of our {{count}}+ RENAISSANCE Paris partner opticians near you. Try our luxury eyewear and receive personalized advice.

hero.label: Partner Network
hero.subtitle: Excellence near you.
hero.description: Each store embodies Renaissance values: excellence, symbolism and French craftsmanship.

cta.label: Become a partner
cta.title: Are you an optician?
cta.subtitle: Join excellence.
cta.description: Join the Renaissance network and offer your clients exceptional eyewear, symbols of French heritage and a unique vision of luxury.

seo.title: Order Tracking
seo.description: Track your RENAISSANCE Paris order with peace of mind. Enter your order number and email to access your delivery status.

form.error: Please enter your order number and email.

whereIsOrder.a: After shipping, you will receive an email with your tracking number. Delivery takes 1 to 3 business days in metropolitan France, 2-3 days for the EU.

deliveryTimes.a: Orders are shipped within 24-48h. Delivery in metropolitan France takes 1-2 business days, 2-3 days for the EU, and 3-7 days internationally.

noConfirmation.q: I didn't receive my confirmation email.
noConfirmation.a: Check your spam and junk mail. If you can't find your confirmation, contact us with your name and order date at contact@renaissance-eyewear.fr.

modifyOrder.q: Can I modify or cancel my order?
modifyOrder.a: You can modify or cancel your order within 2 hours of placing it by contacting us immediately. After this period, your order is being prepared.

returnPolicy.a: You have 14 days from receipt to return your order. The product must be in its original condition with intact packaging. Return shipping is covered by Renaissance.

refundDelay.a: The refund is processed within 14 days of receiving and validating your return, using the original payment method.

ctaBottom.label: Customer Service
ctaBottom.title: A question?
ctaBottom.subtitle: Our team is at your service.
